name: reusable produce bag
notes:
a versatile crochet net drawstring bag ideal for produce (fruit) and holding other items. 

very stretchy and strong to hold a large volume and weight. 

any 4ply or 5ply cotton yarn is suitable. gauge is not important. 

you will need:

    approx 1/3 ball premier ‘cotton flair’ yarn
    4 mm crochet hook
    yarn needle
    scissors

stitches used us terminology:

    chain stitch (ch)
    single crochet (sc) us = double crochet (dc) uk
    double crochet (dc) us = treble stitch (tr) uk
    slip stitch (sl)
